{{ _('Best Cards') }}

{% trans trimmed twda=external("http://www.vekn.fr/decks/twd.htm", "Tournament Winning Deck Archive (TWDA)"), hunting_grounds=card("Academic Hunting Ground", "Hunting Grounds") %}

This category presents the best cards of the game. The list is based on a statistical analysis of the {{ twda }} provided by VEKN, considering the 2000+ decks from 2008 onward. The best cards are those that have been included in the most winning decks since then.

All clan {{ hunting_grounds }} and, on occasions, some low capacity vampires, have been omitted for convenience.

Abominations {{ img_clan_abominations }}, Blood Brothers {{ img_clan_blood_brothers }}, Panders {{ img_clan_panders }}, Osebo {{ img_clan_osebo }}, Nagaraja {{ img_clan_nagaraja }} and Samedi {{ img_clan_samedi }} are too rarely played to be included in this analysis: they lack the numbers for a statistical review to be relevant.

Gargoyles {{ img_clan_gargoyles }} are included in the Tremere {{ img_clan_tremere }} clan analysis, all Imbued are included in the same analysis regardless of their creed.
